data.title: Exile: Home of the Twentieth Century
data.meta_description: Exile: Home of the Twentieth Century was published in The Exile and Return of Writers from East-Central Europe on page 4.
data.text:
Neubauer, John. "Exile: Home of the Twentieth Century". The Exile and Return of Writers from East-Central Europe: A Compendium, edited by John Neubauer and Borbála Zsuzsanna Török, Berlin, New York: De Gruyter, 2009, pp. 4-106. https://doi.org/10.1515/9783110217742.1.4
